mapper.select: SELECT a.`name` AS goods_name, a.barcode as bar_code,c.id as category_id ,c.`name` as category_name,b.* FROM t_goods a,t_stock b,t_goods_category c WHERE a.sku = b.sku and a.category_id = c.id AND a.business_id = #{bid} and b.delete_flg = 0 ORDER BY new_date

SELECT a.*,c.`name` as goods_name,c.barcode as bar_code,d.name as category_name FROM t_stock a LEFT JOIN t_depot b ON a.depot_id = b.depot_id LEFT JOIN t_goods c on a.sku = c.sku LEFT JOIN t_goods_category d ON d.id = c.category_id WHERE b.business_id = #{bid} and a.delete_flg = 0 ORDER BY new_date
